00066 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00067 l4_ipc_gate_get_infos_u(l4_cap_idx_t gate, l4_umword_t *label, l4_utcb_t *utcb);
00068 
00075 enum L4_ipc_gate_ops
00076 {
00077   L4_IPC_GATE_OP_BIND     = 0x10, 
00078   L4_IPC_GATE_OP_GET_INFO = 0x11, 
00079 };
00080 
00081 
00082 /* IMPLEMENTATION -----------------------------------------------------------*/
00083 
00084 #include <l4/sys/ipc.h>
00085 
00086 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00087 l4_ipc_gate_bind_thread_u(l4_cap_idx_t gate,
00088                           l4_cap_idx_t thread, l4_umword_t label,
00089                           l4_utcb_t *utcb)
00090 {
00091   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00092   m->mr[0] = L4_IPC_GATE_OP_BIND;
00093   m->mr[1] = label;
00094   m->mr[2] = l4_map_obj_control(0, 0);
00095   m->mr[3] = l4_obj_fpage(thread, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00096   return l4_ipc_call(gate, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_KOBJECT, 2, 1, 0),
00097                      L4_IPC_NEVER);
00098 }
00099 
00100 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00101 l4_ipc_gate_get_infos_u(l4_cap_idx_t gate, l4_umword_t *label, l4_utcb_t *utcb)
00102 {
00103   l4_msgtag_t tag;
00104   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00105   m->mr[0] = L4_IPC_GATE_OP_GET_INFO;
00106   tag = l4_ipc_call(gate, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_KOBJECT, 1, 0, 0),
00107                     L4_IPC_NEVER);
00108   if (!l4_msgtag_has_error(tag) && l4_msgtag_label(tag) >= 0)
00109     *label = m->mr[0];
00110 
00111   return tag;
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00115 
00116 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00117 l4_ipc_gate_bind_thread(l4_cap_idx_t gate, l4_cap_idx_t thread,
00118                         l4_umword_t label)
00119 {
00120   return l4_ipc_gate_bind_thread_u(gate, thread, label, l4_utcb());
00121 }
00122 
00123 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00124 l4_ipc_gate_get_infos(l4_cap_idx_t gate, l4_umword_t *label)
00125 {
00126   return l4_ipc_gate_get_infos_u(gate, label, l4_utcb());
00127 }
